Texto: 
ua: microscopic hematuria
• ultrasound images show hyperechoic foci in the region of the renal medullary pyramids. 

• ct images demonstrate high density particles in the region of the renal medullary pyramids.
medullary nephrocalcinosis
• medullary nephrocalcinosis
• papillary necrosis
40 y.o. man with a history of "kidney stones"
